org.pac4j.core.profile

Class AttributesDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.profile.AttributesDefinition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaeUserServiceAttributesDefinition, HttpAttributesDefinition, OAuthAttributesDefinition, YahooOpenIdAttributesDefinition

    public class AttributesDefinition
extends Object
    This class is the definition of the attributes of a profile.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu

      • addAttribute

        protected void addAttribute(String name,
                            AttributeConverter<? extends Object> converter)
        Add an attribute as a primary one and its converter to this attributes definition.

      • addAttribute

        protected void addAttribute(String name,
                            AttributeConverter<? extends Object> converter,
                            boolean principal)
        Add an attribute, its primary aspect and its converter to this attributes definition.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the attribute
        converter - converter
        principal - whether the attribute is principal

      • convert

        public Object convert(String name,
                      Object value)
        Convert an attribute into the right type. If no converter exists for this attribute name, the attribute is returned or null, depending on the ProfileHelper.enforceProfileDefinition setting.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the attribute
        value - value of the attribute
        Returns:
        the converted attribute or null if no converter exists for this attribute name
